summary: Go camping in style without being associated with the Imperials. Or give your Imperial tent new colors.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Meo\'s Tents For All - Resource
Version: 1.0
Date: 04/03/2012
Category: Modders Resource
Author(s): Meo

[color=\"#FFA500\"][u]Update:[/u] There was a problem with MEOlargetent01.nif not showing the texture in CK and game.[/color]

Description
===========
Go camping in style without being associated with the Imperials. Or give your Imperial tent new colors. 

Install
=======
Extract to your skyrim\\data directory and add in the Creative Kit as statics. Also, make use of Texture Sets instead of packaging multiple nifs in your release.

Optional high resolution textures included, just extract over the others.

Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as \'meo3000\'
On the Official Forum, TES Alliance and SkyRE(ORE) as Meo.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim.
Thanks to the Niftools team.
Thanks to skyrim.nexusmods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.

Licensing/Legal
===============
As always, do not port to other games. Keep the directory structure intact. Please give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.

Enjoy, Meo.
author: Meo
